title: Lux: "I can't decide which one to wear to the party!"
body:
Which should Lux wear? Note this isn't for a League match, but for a social gathering.

EDIT: Source - http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=60321961

replies.body: Nothing ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:99}} : "E-ECCHI!" _(slap)_

{{champion:98}} *Rubs cheek nonchalantly*
{{champion:99}} "Sh-Shenpai! I-I'm so sorry! Forgive me, if I had known it was you-"
{{champion:98}} "It's fine. I tend to startle people with my entrances."
{{champion:99}} "Sh-shenpai, please forgive me!"
{{champion:98}} "I've already-"
{{champion:99}} "Because if you cannot forgive me I would-"
{{champion:98}} "Ok, I get it!"
{{champion:86}} *Comes out drying his hair with a towel, stops and stares at Shen*
{{champion:98}} *Stares back*
{{champion:86}} "...what are you doing in my house?"
{{champion:98}} "There's a rogue spirit here causing mayhem, and I came to get rid of it."
{{champion:86}} "Oh. Ok, then. Wait, why is Lux stroking your chest-"
{{champion:99}} "GO TO YOUR ROOM GAREN!"
{{champion:86}} *Runs away squealing Demacia*
{{champion:99}} "So... um, Shenpai... do you want to-"
{{champion:98}} "Please shut up and get away from me, I'm working. You're annoying."
{{champion:99}} *Blushes and swoons*
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/009/832/dafuq-did-i-just-read-meme.jpg
http://img02.deviantart.net/2f4e/i/2016/038/f/7/jhin_meme_by_mikouchan-d9qyb6a.png

But... That's invoking the power of your archnemesis...

Has the Shenpai gone over to the Art Side?!?!?
{{champion:98}} "To me, there is no such thing as a nemesis. Only nuisances."
{{champion:238}} "You cannot protect your feelings, Shen. Like you couldn't protect your father."

{{champion:98}} *Ignores Zed*
{{champion:238}} "I WILL kill you!"
{{champion:98}} *Still does not notice*
{{champion:238}} "SAY SOMETHING DAMN IT!"
{{champion:98}} *Silence*
{{champion:238}} "NOTICE ME"
{{champion:98}} *Starts walking away*
{{champion:238}} "COME BACK! YOU AND I AREN'T FINISHED!"
{{champion:157}} "Scurry back to your shadows, ninja."
{{champion:238}} *Turns his head toward Yasuo menacingly*
{{champion:157}} "Nice mask. Your... uh, mom, sew that for you-Gurgh-!"
{{champion:238}} *Pulls blade out of Yasuo, takes Yasuo's sword and leaves*
{{champion:202}} "You belong in the shadows. No audience could love you."

{{champion:1}} "Let's count to 5!"
{{champion:202}} "God damn it I THOUGHT I ALREADY SHOT YOU!"
Oh shenpai
were they gonna have super happy fun time?
Hey man, like a metapod , all I'm going to do is harden.
That's the only thing you're good for until you evolve, so might as well use the time.

I see what you did there.

http://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/6269897_700b.jpg
I spent a good minute just laughing at that Teemo face.
{{champion:86}} Neither. You are wearing your battle regalia along with me.

>{{champion:86}} Neither. You are wearing your battle regalia along with me.

>DEMACIAAAA!!!!

FTFY

But...Garen's _battle regalia_, isn't that like

http://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s480x480/e15/10914164_1524020897869956_120992571_n.jpg

...?
Oh this is really cute art ahhh. Any idea who the artist is? Tried to follow the naver link but it goes to a blog instead?

He goes by the tag "cal (pmgdd)". At least, that's what I found on Danbooru.

EDIT: Found it on Pixiv - http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=60321961
Ah thank you!! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZiEENY38,comment-id=000b0001,timestamp=2016-12-31T03:31:52.053+0000)
>
> He goes by the tag "cal (pmgdd)". At least, that's what I found on Danbooru.
> 
> EDIT: Found it on Pixiv - http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=60321961

Thanks for the link. I didn't realize that this was the same guy who did SKT LeBlanc and Longzhu Irelia, but now I see the similarity in art.
He's a really good artist.
I dunno, all I know is we are all perverts {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Janna's Dress
that took me a moment
Yeah, is that even considered a dress?
Is it considered publicly decent?
Wear what rek'sai wears ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
the blood and flesh of her enemies?
Yes.

:) a tubing vest


rek'sai has a hot bod lets be real

if its casual, black, formal, white <3
or both... (never one... without the other..)
Wear both.
But should it be black over white, or white over black?
Is it black and blue or white and gold?
No, we are not going through that again.

Not like this.

*Not like this.*
STOP STOP NOPE NOPE WE'RE NEVER MENTIONING THAT HELL EVER AGAIN
White, it goes better with her current hair
The black one doesn't seem too appropriate for a social gather.
How else will she tell the world that she has repressed anger and sadness inside her and its not just a phase it is who she is
What she's wearing rn

If she wears both, she could wear the dark one upside down and flipped, so the breast area of the dress would fit over her butt. 
If it lines up well, her skirt will be by her neck, and look like a Ruff, which was all the rage in fashion (a few hundred years ago).
someone needs to let {{champion:5}}  know his secret agent shirt is no longer clean and pressed.
Definitely the purple one.
As a Lulu player, I definitely support that one. :D

The purple-black one is the job one, where she is all "don' t fuck with my business", together with ice. still weird for a job dress but meh.
The lava and fire one are good for a party, fairy if she wants to feel like a diva.

or if she feels aggressive she can go full Commando. I mean the skin.
If she's trying to be sultry or seductive, black. Otherwise white.
#GirlProblems
